sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext" import api from "../services/api" function HODDashboard() { const { user, logout } = useAuth() const [clearances, setClearances] = useState([]) const [department, setDepartment] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [selectedClearance, setSelectedClearance] = useState(null) const [processingData, setProcessingData] = useState({ status: "", remarks: "", has_dues: false, dues_amount: 0, }) useEffect(() => { fetchPendingClearances() }, []) const fetchPendingClearances = async () => { try { const response = await api.get("/hod/pending-clearances") setClearances(response.data.clearances) setDepartment(response.data.department) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching clearances:", error) } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleProcessClearance = async (clearanceId) => { try { await api.post("/hod/process-clearance", { clearance_id: clearanceId, ...processingData, }) alert("Clearance processed successfully!") setSelectedClearance(null) setProcessingData({ status: "", remarks: "", has_dues: false, dues_amount: 0, }) fetchPendingClearances() } catch (error) { alert("Error processing clearance: " + (error.response?.data?.error || "Unknown error")) } } const openProcessModal = (clearance) => { setSelectedClearance(clearance) setProcessingData({ status: "", remarks: "", has_dues: false, dues_amount: 0, }) } if (loading) { return
Loading pending clearances...
} return (

üè¢ HOD Dashboard

{user.full_name} - {department?.name}

üìã Pending Clearances for {department?.name}

Review and process student clearance requests for your department.

{clearances.length === 0 ? (

‚úÖ All Caught Up!

No pending clearances at the moment.

) : (
{clearances.map((clearance) => ( ))}
Student Name Admission Number Class Phone Reason Submitted Action
{clearance.full_name} {clearance.admission_number} {clearance.class_form} {clearance.stream} {clearance.phone} {clearance.reason.replace("_", " ").toUpperCase()} {new Date(clearance.submitted_at).toLocaleDateString()}
)}
{selectedClearance && (

Process Clearance - {selectedClearance.full_name}

Student: {selectedClearance.full_name}

Admission: {selectedClearance.admission_number}

Class: {selectedClearance.class_form} {selectedClearance.stream}

Phone: {selectedClearance.phone}

Reason: {selectedClearance.reason.replace("_", " ").toUpperCase()}
